spec_data.Name: python2-windtalker
spec_data.Description:
With python2-windtalker you can Encrypt/decrypt binary data, text, files or even
a entire directory in single line of code. It support both symmetry and
asymmetry encryption algorithm.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Sat 29 Jul 2017 05:14:59 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Super easy-to-use encryption and decryption tool
